channel.title: Black Mesa Themepack
channel.description:
I was going to put together a black mesa theme pack for myself and even got as far as asking the Facebook community to submit some desktop icons. [url]https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.511199448898869.119761.391087910910024&type=1[/url]
Anyone here have any icons, cursors, screensavers or whatnot to contribute?

item.title: Black Mesa Themepack
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Black Mesa Windows theme pack:
9 wallpapers
1 sound
2 desktop icons
1 transparent orange cursor

Black Mesa Windows theme files: (basically the theme pack in files only so you can choose what you want to change)
9 wallpapers
2 sound
28 desktop icons
24 cursors

Black Mesa Screensaver:
The separate screensaver is a compilation of all the background chapters rolled into one extended ‘movie’.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Themepack
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Merry Christmas everyone! And have a Happy New Year!

Black Mesa Windows theme pack: https://rapidshare.com/files/2565462905/Black%20Mesa%20Theme%20Pack.zip
Black Mesa Windows theme files: https://rapidshare.com/files/3599139189/Black%20Mesa%20Earthbound%20Theme.zip
Black Mesa Screensaver: https://rapidshare.com/files/4110636476/Black%20Mesa%20Earthbound%20Theme%20Screensaver.zip

you can find the links on my bm page as well: https://www.catzeyes93.com/images/BlackMesa/index.html

I tried to download and I got this:

File owner’s public traffic exhausted. (da3c7b74)

You should upload them somewhere else.

Edit: downloaded them from your website.

Read full topic
